name: European Convention for Constructional Steelwork
goal:
The aim of ECCS is to promote the use of steelwork in the construction sector by the development of standards and promotional information.
It also helps to inform decision makers through the management of working committees, publications, conferences and by active representation on European and International Committees dealing with standardisation, research and development and education.
ECCS is also involved within European projects to always further extend knowledge and research about all possibilities offered by steel
interests: Education, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Internal Market
euInitiatives:
review of Construction Products Regulation
Digitalisation of the construction sector
Design for deconstruction
Reuse of construction products
competitiveness of construction sector
